November 2017 - Present : Sea Group - Ocha Project Manager 
Head of Sales Operations, Strategies and Policies, Vietnam 
-
Business Analysis: Track & Analyse business performance; 
-
Sales policy: Track, Analyse & Propose Trade marketing schemes; 
-
Sales incentives: Track, Analyse, Tailor & Propose incentives programmes to ensure 
business targets ( short term & long term); 
-
Project Operations & Operational Support: Create, Track & Continuously improve 
operational procedures to optimise resource & budget 
-
Responsible for change management & continuous improvement ( e.g. contracts): 
working closely with Finance, Legal & Marketing  
●

Vietnam

Quality projects 
-
Lead, Initiate, Plan & Execute Quality projects at Homecare liquid factory; 
-
Innovation testing & quality assurance

-
Inventory Management: planning production & logistics for 2 categories Fabric 
cleaning & Fabric conditioner for both domestic & export market in SEAA ( South 
East Asia & Australia); 
-
Utilise capacity & maximize all resource ( packaging, raw materials, human resource, 
factory machinery capacity, etc…) while minimizing cost & achieving targets 
-
Collaborate with multi cross-functions to realize production & distribution plan 
July 2015 - November 2015: Field Sales- Customer development 
-
General Trade/ Distributive Trade: sales & lead sales team to achieve month-end 
target while collaborating with Distributor Company in terms of stock ( primary stock 
management) & how to maximise Unilever trade marketing programs to push 
secondary stock. 
-
Modern Trade (Supermarket,Hypermarket): trade marketing programs & promotion of 
Unilever in modern trade ( visibility, diamond place, seasonal sales program targets & 
relevant gifts…) 
-
Rural Stint: one-month homestay in rural area to observe, research, study consumers 
behavior while executing 6 marketing & on-site activities for Unilever brands.

placement
